entries.name: current_command_chain()
entries.desc: Make the current command chain accessible with in a Bundler::Thor-(sub)command

entries.name: invoke(name = nil, *args)
entries.desc: Receives a name and invokes it. The name can be a string (either “command” or “namespace:command”), a Bundler::Thor::Command, a Class or a Bundler::Thor instance. If the command cannot be guessed by name, it can also be supplied as second argument.
